data.text:
New York: Alfred A. Knopf, 1975. First Edition. Hardcover. Item #15005

ISBN: 0394494016

266pp. Cloth backed boards. Basis for Michael Crichton's 1979 movie featuring Sean Connery, Donald Sutherland and Lesley-Anne Down. Softening to spine ends, slightly yellowed endpapers, board edges are a bit faded. A near fine copy in near fine dustjacket with mild edge wear and nick to upper edge of spine panel.; Octavo.
